input.sentences: the local kite club took advantage of the great weather .
the kites were flying high in the sky .
one particular box shaped kite got all the attention and applause .
it looked unwieldy but its owner flew it with skill .
just before lunch the club gathered for a group photo .
output.sentences: The weather was perfect for a day at the local park with their kites.
the sky was clear and blue with lots of kites flying around.
One kite was shaped like a box.
The shaped kite was unwieldy and required a lot of skill from the owner.
After the kite flying everyone gathered for a photo before lunch.
